content: nelly is named after a nickname we have for my own beautiful daughter her shaping is loosely based upon her cousin weebee s but she s taller and slimmer than weebee made using aran worsted/10ply weight yarn and a 3 5mm hook my nelly stands at 11 inches tall however other yarn weights and hooks can of course be used to create smaller or larger dolls this doll includes underwear and sitting options her arms are crocheted onto her body she has little thumbs and hear ears are made when working her head pattern includes doll both seated and standing options available hair cap and pigtails the outfit she is wearing in the pictures here is also a free pattern and can be found here 3 **you can find lots of outfit patterns for nelly here 1 including over 70 items of clothing ** and you can find all of other doll patterns plus lots of clothing patterns for them here 2 due to the unexpected but wonderful popularity of all of my weebee dolls and clothing patterns there is now a dedicated facebook group which you can find here 4 this pattern has been tested by several members of the weebee appreciation society facebook group 5 and every effort has been made to ensure that this pattern is error free and ready for publication if you find any errors whatsoever though please don t hesitate to send me a private message here or on facebook and i will amend as soon as possible i hope you have as much fun crocheting weebee and her friends as i and many others have finished products created with this pattern may be used for commercial sale yarn and hook size my weebee doll patterns are designed so that you can use any yarn or hook of your choice to achieve different sized dolls to your liking therefore the clothing patterns have no specific yarn or hook size specifications but information is contained within which will help you to create the perfect fit for your specific doll terminology us other items needed tapestry needle 12mm safety eyes toy stuffing format of pattern pdf -
